definition: the unlimited expanse in which everything is located, place at intervals
details:
noun
- the unlimited expanse in which everything is located
= example: the unlimited expanse in which everything is located
= synonyms: infinite
- (printing) a block of type without a raised letter
= synonyms: quad
- a blank area
= example: a blank area
= synonyms: place, blank space
- a blank character used to separate successive words in writing or printing
= example: a blank character used to separate successive words in writing or printing
= synonyms: blank
- one of the areas between or below or above the lines of a musical staff
= example: one of the areas between or below or above the lines of a musical staff
- any location outside the Earth's atmosphere
= example: any location outside the Earth's atmosphere
= synonyms: outer space
- an area reserved for some particular purpose
= example: an area reserved for some particular purpose
- an empty area, usually bounded in some way between things
= example: an empty area, usually bounded in some way between things
- the interval between two times
= synonyms: distance
verb
- place at intervals
